column1: #Text=" Katara says : " What do you mean , " you ca n't ? "
#Text=" Aang says : " I promised the girls I 'd give them a ride on Appa .
#Text=Why do n't you come with us ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Watching you show off for a bunch of girls does not sound like fun .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , neither does carrying your basket .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's not my basket .
#Text=I told you , we have to leave Kyoshi soon .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't want to leave Kyoshi yet .
#Text=I ca n't put my finger on it , but there 's something I really like about this place .
#Text=" Koko says : " What 's taking you so long , Aangy ?
